newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Bangladesh taka closes weaker against dollar.
newsitem.headline: Bangladesh taka closes weaker against dollar.

text.p: The Bangladesh taka closed weaker at 43.7400/7450 to the dollar against the previous close at 43.7350/7400 in interbank trading on Wednesday, dealers said.
The local unit was quoted softer at 43.7350/7450 per dollar in early trade and slipped further later amid a slowdown in selling of the greenback.
Dealers said major banks still had comfortable stocks of dollars and the market was expected to remain stable on Thursday.
Interbank call money rates closed flat at 5.5 to 9.5 percent. -- Dhaka Newsroom +880-2-506363
